    category: "category 15",
    size: "size 15",
    description: "description 15",
    availability: "availability 15",
    brand: "brand 15",
    color: "color 15",
    id: "15"
  }],
  //id, name, image, price, desc, size
  cart: [],
  //id, name, image, price, desc, size, qty
  currentItem: null
};

const shopReducer = function () {
  let state = arguments.length > 0 && arguments[0] !== undefined ? arguments[0] : INITIAL_STATE;
  let action = arguments.length > 1 ? arguments[1] : undefined;

  switch (action.type) {
    case actionTypes.ADD_TO_CART:
      //Item data from products array
      const item = state.products.find(product => product.id === action.payload.id); // Check if Item is in cart already

      const inCart = state.cart.find(item => item.id === action.payload.id ? true : false);
      return { ...state,
        cart: inCart ? state.cart.map(item => item.id === action.payload.id ? { ...item,
          qty: item.qty + 1
        } : item) : [...state.cart, { ...item,
          qty: 1
        }]
      };

    case actionTypes.REMOVE_FROM_CART:
      return { ...state,
        cart: state.cart.filter(item => item.id !== action.payload.id)
      };

    case actionTypes.ADJUST_ITEM_QTY:
      return { ...state,
        cart: state.cart.map(item => item.id === action.payload.id ? { ...item,
          qty: +action.payload.qty
        } : item)
      };

    case actionTypes.LOAD_CURRENT_ITEM:
      return { ...state,
        currentItem: action.payload
      };

    default:
      return state;
  }
};

export default shopReducer;

import * as actionTypes from "./shopping-types";

const INITIAL_STATE = {
  products: [
    {
      name: "name 1",
      price: 200,
      image:
        "https://i.pinimg.com/originals/62/98/b0/6298b026a65cf80bcf9dce061e9b79c9.png",
      category: "category 1",
      size: "size 1",
      description: "description 1",
      availability: "availability 1",
      brand: "brand 1",
      color: "color 1",
      id: "1",
    },
    {
      name: "name 2",
      price: 300,
      image:
        "https://i.pinimg.com/originals/62/98/b0/6298b026a65cf80bcf9dce061e9b79c9.png",
      category: "category 2",
      size: "size 2",
      description: "description 2",
      availability: "availability 2",
      brand: "brand 2",
      color: "color 2",
      id: "2",
    },
    {
      name: "name 3",
      price: 400,
      image:
        "https://i.pinimg.com/originals/62/98/b0/6298b026a65cf80bcf9dce061e9b79c9.png",
      category: "category 3",
      size: "size 3",
      description: "description 3",
      availability: "availability 3",
      brand: "brand 3",
      color: "color 3",
      id: "3",
    },
    {
      name: "name 4",
      price: 230,
      image:
        "https://i.pinimg.com/originals/62/98/b0/6298b026a65cf80bcf9dce061e9b79c9.png",
      category: "category 4",
      size: "size 4",
      description: "description 4",
      availability: "availability 4",
      brand: "brand 4",
      color: "color 4",
      id: "4",
    },
    {
      name: "name 5",
      price: 380,
      image:
        "https://i.pinimg.com/originals/62/98/b0/6298b026a65cf80bcf9dce061e9b79c9.png",
      category: "category 5",
      size: "size 5",
      description: "description 5",
      availability: "availability 5",
      brand: "brand 5",
      color: "color 5",
      id: "5",
    },
    {
      name: "name 6",
      price: 200,
      image:
        "https://i.pinimg.com/originals/62/98/b0/6298b026a65cf80bcf9dce061e9b79c9.png",
      category: "category 6",
      size: "size 6",
      description: "description 6",
      availability: "availability 6",
      brand: "brand 6",
      color: "color 6",
      id: "6",
    },
    {
      name: "name 7",
      price: 230,
      image:
        "https://i.pinimg.com/originals/62/98/b0/6298b026a65cf80bcf9dce061e9b79c9.png",
      category: "category 7",
      size: "size 7",
      description: "description 7",
      availability: "availability 7",
      brand: "brand 7",
      color: "color 7",
      id: "7",
    },
    {
      name: "name 8",
      price: 340,
      image:
        "https://i.pinimg.com/originals/62/98/b0/6298b026a65cf80bcf9dce061e9b79c9.png",
      category: "category 8",
      size: "size 8",
      description: "description 8",
      availability: "availability 8",
      brand: "brand 8",
      color: "color 8",
      id: "8",
    },
    {
      name: "name 9",
      price: 250,
      image:
        "https://i.pinimg.com/originals/62/98/b0/6298b026a65cf80bcf9dce061e9b79c9.png",
      category: "category 9",
      size: "size 9",
      description: "description 9",
      availability: "availability 9",
      brand: "brand 9",
      color: "color 9",
      id: "9",
    },
    {
      name: "name 10",
      price: 399,
      image:
        "https://i.pinimg.com/originals/62/98/b0/6298b026a65cf80bcf9dce061e9b79c9.png",
      category: "category 10",
      size: "size 10",
      description: "description 10",
      availability: "availability 10",
      brand: "brand 10",
      color: "color 10",
      id: "10",
    },
    {
      name: "name 11",
      price: 345,
      image:
        "https://i.pinimg.com/originals/62/98/b0/6298b026a65cf80bcf9dce061e9b79c9.png",
      category: "category 11",
      size: "size 11",
      description: "description 11",
      availability: "availability 11",
      brand: "brand 11",
      color: "color 11",
      id: "11",
    },
    {
      name: "name 12",
      price: 859,
      image:
        "https://i.pinimg.com/originals/62/98/b0/6298b026a65cf80bcf9dce061e9b79c9.png",
      category: "category 12",
      size: "size 12",
      description: "description 12",
      availability: "availability 12",
      brand: "brand 12",
      color: "color 12",
      id: "12",
    },
    {
      name: "name 13",
      price: 610,
      image:
        "https://i.pinimg.com/originals/62/98/b0/6298b026a65cf80bcf9dce061e9b79c9.png",
      category: "category 13",
      size: "size 13",
      description: "description 13",
      availability: "availability 13",
      brand: "brand 13",
      color: "color 13",
      id: "13",
    },
    {
      name: "name 14",
      price: 204,
      image:
        "https://i.pinimg.com/originals/62/98/b0/6298b026a65cf80bcf9dce061e9b79c9.png",
      category: "category 14",
      size: "size 14",
      description: "description 14",
      availability: "availability 14",
      brand: "brand 14",
      color: "color 14",
      id: "14",
    },
    {
      name: "name 15",
      price: 1000,
      image:
        "https://i.pinimg.com/originals/62/98/b0/6298b026a65cf80bcf9dce061e9b79c9.png",
      category: "category 15",
      size: "size 15",
      description: "description 15",
      availability: "availability 15",
      brand: "brand 15",
      color: "color 15",
      id: "15",
    },
  ], //id, name, image, price, desc, size
  cart: [], //id, name, image, price, desc, size, qty
  currentItem: null,
};

const shopReducer = (state = INITIAL_STATE, action) => {
  switch (action.type) {
    case actionTypes.ADD_TO_CART:
      //Item data from products array
      const item = state.products.find(
        (product) => product.id === action.payload.id
      );
      // Check if Item is in cart already
      const inCart = state.cart.find((item) =>
        item.id === action.payload.id ? true : false
      );

      return {
        ...state,
        cart: inCart
          ? state.cart.map((item) =>
              item.id === action.payload.id
                ? { ...item, qty: item.qty + 1 }
                : item
            )
          : [...state.cart, { ...item, qty: 1 }],
      };
    case actionTypes.REMOVE_FROM_CART:
      return {
        ...state,
        cart: state.cart.filter((item) => item.id !== action.payload.id),
      };
    case actionTypes.ADJUST_ITEM_QTY:
      return {
        ...state,
        cart: state.cart.map((item) =>
          item.id === action.payload.id
            ? { ...item, qty: +action.payload.qty }
            : item
        ),
      };
    case actionTypes.LOAD_CURRENT_ITEM:
      return {
        ...state,
        currentItem: action.payload,
      };
    default:
      return state;
  }
};

export default shopReducer;
